description: This file implements the core functions for the Slap Object Record (Oro) in a service logic component, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions for managing the lifecycle of the object.

classes.name: SLAP_OBJ_RECORD_OBJECT
classes.description: The main object structure for the Slap Object Record, encapsulating function pointers and member variables related to the object lifecycle and operations.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapOroCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Slap Object Record instance, setting up its member functions and context handles.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOroRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the specified Slap Object Record, freeing resources and removing associated components.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOroEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls subordinate objects needed by the Slap Object Record.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOroInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the Slap Object Record's member variables and function pointers.
